biotools.summary: A Snakemake workflow for assembly, annotation, and genomic binning of metagenome sequence data | A global overview of pleiotropy and genetic architecture in complex traits | ATLAS - Three commands to start analysing your metagenome data | Genome wide association study ATLAS | Welcome to the Atlas of GWAS Summary Statistics | This atlas is a database of publicly available GWAS summary statistics | All databases and dependencies are installed on the fly in the directory db-dir | Free document hosting provided by Read the Docs
